attributes.action: Close betting shops in tier 3. Bookies are nonessential and shouldn’t be open.
attributes.additional_details: They put both employees and customers at risk for what is essentially a leisure  activity that can be done online. They are no different from arcades or bowling alleys. The steps taken inside the shops during a globally pandemic are not enough and often ignored by both staff and customers.
attributes.background: I want betting shops to be declared nonessential and to close in tier 3 and above.
